BACKUPD-HELPER(8) System Manager's Manual BACKUPD-HELPER(8)

NAME

backupd-helper — Time Machine backup daemon helper

DESCRIPTION

backupd-helper assists the Time Machine backup daemon with scheduling and initiating Time Machine backups when appropriate.

Users should not run backupd-helper manually.

SEE ALSO

backupd(8), tmutil(8)

November 10, 2016 macOS
